subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN3390 is on the way
description_text:
Hi,

The delivery company tried to deliver the package today (Order #SSN3390,
DHL tracking n°CE326631435DE). I could not accept the package as the
address was incorrect and I was not there.

The delivery company showed up in Lille, France. It should have been
delivered in Béthune, France.

There was a confusion between the billing address (Lille) and the shipping
address (Béthune).

Can you please arrange that the package be shipped to Béthune, at the
billing address I already provided?

Regards,

Alexandre Vasseur

Le mer. 12 nov. 2025 à 04:14, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> a écrit :

> SIMSONN

conversations.body_text: Hi Alexandre Vasseur,    Okay, we'll reship your order. Please confirm your address.   Vasseur Alexandre 29 Rue De Carency 62400 Béthune 法国 +33 6 81 38 03 19

Hi,

Yes, this is correct.

Thank you.

Regards,

Alex


Le lun. 17 nov. 2025, 10:10, service@simsonn.com

Hi Alexandre Vasseur,    This is your logistics tracking link. The shipment originates from China, but will incur no customs duties, so please rest assured.  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3293756299724
